title: Create Your Profile
description: Please fill out your profile information. This will help us connect you with other community members.
motivationHint: Why do you want to join the community? What are your goals and interests in data science and machine learning?
previewDescription: Here's how your profile card will appear to other community members.
completeProfileDescription: Tell us more about yourself to complete your registration
motivationPlaceholder: What motivated you to join the DSML Kazakhstan community?
otherLinksPlaceholder: GitHub, personal website, etc. (one per line)
visitCardDescription: Create and share your digital visit card
userNotFound: The requested user profile could not be found.
updateSuccessDescription: Your profile has been updated successfully. You'll be redirected to the dashboard.
updateError: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
createProfileDescription: You need to create a profile to continue.
offline: You appear to be offline. Some features may not work until you reconnect to the internet.
connectionError: Unable to connect to the database. Please try again later.
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
offlineError: You are offline. Please check your internet connection and try again.
uniqueConstraintError: This nickname is already taken by another user. Please choose a different one.
serverError: A server error occurred. Please try again later.
createProfileDescription: Please fill out your profile information to join the DSML Kazakhstan community.
createSuccessDescription: Your profile has been created. You'll be redirected to the dashboard.
requiredFieldsError: Please fill in all required fields marked with *
nicknameError: The nickname you chose is already taken. Please choose a different one.
textLengthError: Please ensure 'About You' and 'Motivation' sections have at least 10 words each.
redirectingToEdit: You already have a profile. Redirecting to edit mode...
redirectingToCreate: You don't have a profile yet. Redirecting to create mode...
imageFormatError: Unsupported image format. Please use JPEG, PNG, WebP, or GIF.
imageCompressionError: Failed to compress the image. Please try again.
